description: Retrieve the S3 Access Grants instance that contains a particular prefix. You must have the s3:GetAccessGrantsInstanceForPrefix permission for the caller account to use this operation. The prefix owner account must grant you the following permissions to their S3 Access Grants instance: s3:GetAccessGrantsInstanceForPrefix.

parameters.name: AccountId
parameters.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that is making this request.

parameters.name: S3Prefix
parameters.description: The S3 prefix of the access grants that you would like to retrieve.

nested_items.name: AccessGrantsInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the S3 Access Grants instance.

nested_items.name: AccessGrantsInstanceId
nested_items.description: The ID of the S3 Access Grants instance. The ID is default. You can have one S3 Access Grants instance per Region per account.
